Section.name: About AITS
Section.description:
Aravali Institute of Technical Studies was established in 2008. The Institute is a part of Aravali Group of colleges. Institute was established with the collective efforts of many devoted experts having long and outstanding academic experience in the field of professional education. The campus is located amidst the Aravali hills. It is located at a distance of 11 km from Udaipur city and opposite to Umarda railway station. Institute is approved to AICTE and affiliated to Rajasthan Technical University, Kota (RTU)
The institute offers undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma level programs in several specializations. Admission to courses is granted on the basis of merit as well as qualifying entrance examinations. AITS offers world-class infrastructure and a highly qualified faculty of nearly 100 members. The institute has hostel provisions for both boys and girls, as well as facilities such as library, sports, mess, healthcare, transportation cultural events and more. AITS also has a good placement record with more than 60 recruiting companies in the year 2023.
55% marks in BE or B.Tech in the relevant field.
10th from a recognized board
